content: I am currently an undergraduate at Peking University majoring in computer science and advised by Prof. Baoquan Chen. My research interest lies in applying deep learning to computer graphics, especially in computer animation, to challenge practical and important problems. Meanwhile, I am interning in Visual Computing and Learning lab at PKU and AICFVE, Beijing File Academy.

title: Peizhuo Li
